output_list.reason: The mintToken function allows an attacker to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens owned by the attacker, due to a lack of overflow checks.
The transferFrom function allows unauthorized transfers, due to incorrect conditions for verifying sufficient funds and allowances.
The transfer function allows unauthorized users to transfer tokens, due to a missing access control check.
The approve function allows unauthorized users to approve token transfers, due to a missing access control check.
The burnFrom function allows an attacker to burn arbitrary amounts of tokens from a victim, due to a lack of overflow checks.
